body:
Hello Avicus!


I've searched around the website to find were you can vote on different sites in order to get Credits or whatever. I know that there was a such page before but I can't find it... Does it even exist? And if no, please take it back! It was a nice feature were players could vote and support the server and also get some Creditzzzz.

title: What happened to the voting page?
